words.prompt: A _____________ is an account given in a particular way.
_____________ means “in the end” or “finally.”
To _____________ means “to reach agreement by having each side give up some of its demands.”
A _____________ is a sense of obligation toward something.
_____________ are formal changes made according to official procedures.
A _____________ is a government that is run by the people who live under it.
_____________ means “laws that are made or passed.”
A _____________ is a special right or benefit held by a certain group of people.
A _____________ is a period of ten years.
When something is _____________, it is shining or glowing.
_____________ means to have looked at or explored in order to find out and bring back more information.
To have _____________ is to have turned and twisted the body.
_____________ is puttering or keeping busy in an aimless way.
_____________ is the use of science for practical purposes, especially in engineering and industry.
_____________ is the work that uses scientific knowledge for practical things such as building bridges and dams.
_____________ is the act of giving instructions, ordering, or commanding.
When something is a _____________, it is a great victory or success.
A _____________ object stays in one place in the air.
To _____________ something is to work hard to achieve a goal.
_____________ means “hanging or swinging loosely."
When you repeat words, you are using _____________.
A _____________ in a poem can contain any number of lines.
If I say the tree is scrawny, the _____________ is different from saying the tree is thin.
The _____________ of joyful is “full of joy.”
